page.title: 15 Tourism
page.content: Whitstable is an ideal place for tourists, providing accomodation in small hotels, guest houses, and on caravan sites. The sea front is safe for bathing, and the town and beach are unspoiled. The town provides a perfect blend of antiquity and modern amenity. Facilities enjoyed by local people and tourists include yachting, fishing, water-skiing, boating, tennis, squash, badminton and horse riding.Old pubs and inns provide food, live music and activities such as pool, darts, bar-billiards, general knowledge quizzes, bat and trap and shove halfpenny. Restaurants offer a choice of French, Chinese, Indian, Italian and British food. There is a local theatre & 4 drama groups.Choral societies, brass band & music clubs provide regular concerts.Dancing clubs offer enjoyment for all age groups.
